options.text: I feel that your stance on politics is closed minded.
You are clearly a man of keen mind when it come to politics.
You have some interesting political views, but I am uncertain I agree with all of them.
I commend your astute religious views.
Your religious beliefs seem well formed, even if I disagree with them.
I have never met someone so ignorant about religion before.
Your taste in entertainment is terrible.
Our preferred forms of entertainment are quite different, but I do find yours interesting.
I applaud your fine choices in entertainment, sir!
CHECKER
Did you see the man who took the monument?
Did you see where this man went when he left?
Is there anything else you remember that could help me?
Let's talk about you...
Goodbye.
Press the first button
Press the second button
Press the third button
Press the fourth button
Leave
ender
Err... Friday flavoured soda?
I'm looking for a specific man. Do you remember serving anyone in a top hat?
Why can't you make the phone call?
Hold that thought, I'll be back in a minute.
ender
What's this you're saying about finding balance?
Do you remember seeing a man in a top hat?
Look, I really need to speak to this Elder Steve.
Excuse me for a minute, will you?
ender
That's an... interesting hairstyle you have there.
Your beard is larger than most men's beards.
I really like your outfit.
This tip is a really nice place to hang out.
Did you actually choose to live here?
Big place you've got here...
Lots of variety in the food you've got around here.
You eat the scraps? Couldn't you just buy some food or something?
The scraps lying around here look really tasty!
This place is really exciting! I can see why you hang out here!
There's plenty of things to look at here.
I guess you could find some cool stuff amongst the junk...
I'll be back in a bit.
You act like you're so tough, but I'm calling out yo' bluff.
You really ain't so mean, in that stupid big machine.
You're a poser and a fake, despite every claim you make!
I'm seeing through your mask, see you're not up to the task.
All pretenders are the same, hear me bring this whole new game!
Even in your stupid hat, you ain't gangsta, you ain't phat.
